safetyTips: Contact-free delivery is offered via Royal Mail / courier or by personal delivery at doorstep.
name: Hokolo
description: Hokolo is a homeware and lifestyle brand founded by Jen Taylor. Working from her home studio in Dulwich, Jen creates colourful and bold patterns, inspired by Scandinavian and mid-century designs, for products ranging from handmade lampshades, placemats to face masks. Shipping is free on orders over Â£30.
